short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch and display the latest Bitcoin news. Aggregates Bitcoin ONLY news from across the world. Displays a BTC Price Indicator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ideal for Bitcoin investors, traders, and HODLers.

The "Bitcoin News" plugin delivers real-time Bitcoin-focused news directly to users. It curates the latest updates, price movement, and market trends, ensuring enthusiasts stay informed without sifting through unrelated content. 

No nonsense, Bitcoin ONLY



** 15.09.24 ** Update v1.2:
Removed dev support text & changed support image
Aligned and resized heading text
Added colour divide line to articles (clearer separation of articles)
